message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate the effort to meet in the middle, but $11,500 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's as high as I can go.
